description:
Grab Nebula for 40% off here: https://go.nebula.tv/the-closer-look

Here's my chemistry video: https://nebula.tv/videos/the-closer-look-how-to-write-character-chemistry

There's a kind of betrayal a story can do which annoys their audience like nothing else. In this video essay, I break it down.

title: When The Film Betrays Its Audience
